about_the_game:
NOTE: This DLC only contains aesthetic content.
No "Pay to Win" and no kind of gameplay advantage content is included and never will be.

Of Guards and Thieves - Jungle Skin Pack includes 14 unique jungle-themed skins, one for each available class, 14 new profile avatars, a new profile badge and an extra bonus of 3000 in-game OGAT coins currency.

Content List:

  • Unique Camo Skin for Assault
  • Unique Camo Skin for Scout
  • Unique Camo Skin for Carrier
  • Unique Camo Skin for Medic
  • Unique Camo Skin for Guardian
  • Unique Camo Skin for Pyro
  • Unique Camo Skin for Sniper
  • Unique Camo Skin for Shadow
  • Unique Camo Skin for Cobra
  • Unique Camo Skin for Juggernaut
  • Unique Camo Skin for Saboteur
  • Unique Camo Skin for Merc
  • Unique Camo Skin for Thief Medic
  • Unique Camo Skin for Hunter
  • 14 New Profile Avatars
  • Unique profile Badge
  • 3000 OGAT Coins (7.5$ extra value)

This DLC can only be purchased once per account.
Jungle Skin Pack content is exclusive and only available for Jungle Skin Pack DLC owner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Of Guards and Thieves - Jungle Skin Pack includes 14 unique jungle-themed skins, one for each available class, 14 new profile avatars, a new profile badge and an extra bonus of 3000 in-game OGAT coins currency.
